snippet: Stung by criticism of its treatment of killer whales, SeaWorld said on Friday that it would build new, larger environments at its theme parks and would fund additional research on the animals.
abstract: SeaWorld says it plans to build new, larger environments at its theme parks and will fund additional research on animals along with conservation programs to protect ocean health and whales in wild; move comes in wake of intense criticism of its treatment of killer whales, raised in 2013 documentary Blackfish.
lead_paragraph: Stung by criticism of its treatment of killer whales, SeaWorld said on Friday that it would build new, larger environments at its theme parks and would fund additional research on the animals.

headline.main: After Film, SeaWorld to Make Improvements
headline.print_headline: After Film, SeaWorld to Make Improvements
